Created an attachment (id=34817)
zip containing two feature projects

To reproduce (I20060215-1600):

1. import org.eclipse.platform-feature and org.eclipse.platform.sdk features from zip to your workspace.
2. Select PDE Tools -> Create Ant Build File from context menu of org.eclipse.platform.sdk/feature.xml
That belongs to pde ui. You got tricked by the "internal.ui.build" in the package name :-)
